mapper.select: select t2.id, t2.name, t2.perms, t2.pid, t2.order, t2.description, t2.create_time, t2.mod_time from sys_role_permission t1 left join sys_permission t2 on t1.permission_id = t2.id and t2.is_deleted = 0 where t1.role_id = #{roleId}

select p.id, p.name, p.perms, p.pid, p.order, p.description, p.create_time, p.mod_time from sys_role_permission rp left join sys_permission p on rp.permission_id = p.id and p.is_deleted = 0 where rp.role_id in (select t1.role_id from sys_user_role t1 where t1.user_id = #{userId})
